page.title: 03THORNTON COMMUNITY CENTRE
page.content: People wanted the community centre for things like School meetings & childrens activities.It costs about Â£20 a week to run it.The Community Centre Committee trustees are a registered charity.Many people use the centre including playgroup 3 times a week,mothers and toddlers and coffee break,youth groups,badminton,senior citizens. In June this year we questioned 72 households,this is 10% of the total in Thornton.52 people said they used the C.C at least once a week. 8 never use it 10 use it once a week. We think this shows how important it is to the village.
